headline: Infidels 0 - 1 Shumucks, A Manager's Reaction
body: Its definitley not the result we're looking for today. I don't think the scoreline repersents the effort the lads put in and I am disapointed in the outcome. We've definitly got to make impprovements on how we approach this game tactically. With this is mind,  onwards and upwards to out next match, Monday
author: Montgomery, Infidels F.C. Manager
